programme.title: BKB 42: Music City Brawl
programme.desc: From June 21, 2025. Featuring Javon Wright vs. Carlos Alexandre, plus Jamie Driver vs. Helen Peralta in bare-knuckle boxing action from Nashville, Tenn.

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: A death-row inmate from a Central American jail is among the prisoners taken to a remote island for a to-the-death match broadcast live over the Internet.

programme.title: The Condemned 2
programme.desc: A former bounty hunter (Randy Orton) lands in a tournament where convicts fight to the death for an online audience.

programme.title: Drive Angry 3D
programme.desc: A vengeful father escapes from hell and chases after the men who killed his daughter and kidnapped his granddaughter.

programme.title: Rebel Without a Crew: The Robert Rodriguez Film School
programme.desc: Robert breaks down how he approaches low-budget screenwriting and teaches the audience how to start their own screenplays by using his notecard method.

programme.title: Ice
programme.desc: Tensions rise when the Green family attends a funeral; a diamond dealer with ties to Cam's past arrives in L.A.

programme.title: Ice
programme.desc: Jake and Lady Rah form an alliance against Pieter; Freddy and Ava work together in an attempt to gain access to a Russian diamond syndicate; Cam and Sarah's relationship takes a turn for the worst.

programme.title: Matador
programme.desc: Agent Tony Bravo is recruited by the CIA to go undercover as a member of the L.A. Riot soccer team.

programme.title: Matador
programme.desc: The team tracks a hired assassin with the help of the codes stolen from Gideon Khan's tablet; Tony must protect the target.

programme.title: Matador
programme.desc: Tony goes to an auction with Margot; Tony and Galan reach a new level of understanding; reporter Reyna Flores gets closer to uncovering the truth about Tony.

programme.title: Matador
programme.desc: Tony must rescue Galan's daughter; Annie and Noah come to a realization about Galan.

programme.title: Sin City: A Dame to Kill For
programme.desc: In the central story, Dwight McCarthy (Josh Brolin) struggles with his inner demons and tries to maintain control until his former lover, Ava Lord (Eva Green), returns wanting his help to escape her abusive husband.

programme.title: The Cabin in the Woods
programme.desc: Two unseen scientists manipulate the gory goings-on at a backwoods cabin inhabited by a group of unsuspecting college friends (Kristen Connolly, Chris Hemsworth, Anna Hutchison).

programme.title: Act of Valor
programme.desc: During a mission to rescue a kidnapped CIA agent, Navy SEALs uncover a worldwide terrorist plot against the U.S.

programme.title: Machete Kills
programme.desc: The president recruits ex-Federale Machete (Danny Trejo) to take down an eccentric arms dealer who plans to spread war and anarchy throughout the world.

programme.title: Machine Gun Preacher
programme.desc: Sam Childers (Gerard Butler), a former biker, travels to Africa to establish an orphanage for young victims of war.

programme.title: 3 Days to Kill
programme.desc: A dying Secret Service agent (Kevin Costner) who wants to reconnect with his estranged daughter (Hailee Steinfeld) is offered a potentially lifesaving drug in exchange for completing one final mission.
